org.jboss.windup.graph.model.resource

Interface FileModel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ResourceModel, com.tinkerpop.frames.VertexFrame, WindupVertexFrame
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ApplicationArchiveModel, ArchiveModel, EarArchiveModel, EjbDeploymentDescriptorModel, HibernateConfigurationFileModel, HibernateMappingFileModel, IdentifiedArchiveModel, IgnoredArchiveModel, IgnoredFileModel, JarArchiveModel, JarManifestModel, JavaClassFileModel, JavaSourceFileModel, ReportFileModel, SpringConfigurationFileModel, WarArchiveModel, WebXmlModel, XmlFileModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileModel.Impl, XmlFileModel.Impl

    public interface FileModel
extends ResourceModel
    Represents a File on disk

      • getFileName

        String getFileName()
        Contains the File Name (the last component of the path). Eg, a file /tmp/foo/bar/file.txt would have fileName set to "file.txt"
